customer_name: Grizzly Flats Farm L L C

citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
Section 2.126(b) - Access and inspection of records and property: A responsible adult shall be made available to
accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30 PM on
02/04/2014.
Spoke with the licensee by cell phone and neither he or his wife were available to conduct an inspection. He did
give me his days and hours of availability.
